title: Analogía I, (2da. versión)

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of potatoes, zinc and copper electrodes, voltmeter, electrical cable and nylon monofilament, chair, wood, cloth, and text panel.

medium_display: Potatoes, zinc and copper electrodes, voltmeter, electrical cable and nylon monofilament, chair, wood, cloth, and text panel
credit_line: Jointly acquired by The Art Institute of Chicago, prior gift of Adeline Yates; and the Philadelphia Museum of Art, with funds contributed by the Committee on Modern and Contemporary Art
publication_history:
Fundação Bienal de São Paulo, XIV Bienal internacional de São Paulo, exh. cat. (Fundação Bienal de São Paulo, 1977), p. 78.

M. Catherine de Zegher and Elizabeth A. Macgregor, eds., Víctor Grippo, exh. cat. (Ikon Gallery, 1995), pp. 21 (ill.); 46 (color ill.); 80, cat. 11 (ill.); 90 (color ill.).

Tony Godfrey, “Baldessari; Grippo. London and Brussels,” The Burlington Magazine 137, no. 1109 (August 1995): pp. 566 (ill.); 567.

Musee d'art modern de la ville de Paris, Da Adversidade Vivemos, exh. cat. (Paris-musées, 2001), n. pag.

Marcelo Eduardo Pancheco, Grippo: Una Retrospectiva, Obras 1971–2001, exh. cat. (Fundación Eduardo F. Costantini: Malba – Colección Costantini, 2004), pp. 93, cat. 11 (Analogy I, 2nd version, first version, CAYC, Buenos Aires, ill.); 270.

e-flux, “Víctor Grippo / Anna Maria Maiolino,” e-flux, March 20, 2006 (ill.), http://www.e-flux.com/announcements/41455/victor-grippo-anna-maria-maiolino.

Lorenza Pignatti, “Víctor Grippo,” Tema Celeste, March/April 2007, p. 84.

Cameron Irving, “Víctor Grippo,” frieze, April 14, 2007 (color ill.), https://frieze.com/article/victor-grippo.

Elizabeth Ann Macgregor, “Working with Victor,” Víctor Grippo: Tables of Work and Reflection (Camden Arts Centre, 2006), n. pag. (color ill.).

Gilda Williams, “Víctor Grippo: Camden Arts Centre,” Artforum 45, no. 9 (May 2007): p. 380.

Guy Brett, Alicia Chillida, Mercedes Casanegra, and Dante Poletto, Víctor Grippo: Transformación, exh. cat. (Xunta de Galicia: Centro Galego de Arte Contemporánea, 2014), pp. 60–61 (color ill.); 64 (color ill.); 67 (color ill.); 84 (color ill.); 90 (color ill.); 114–115 (color ill.); 161 (color ill.); 170 (color ill.); 220, cat. 8.

Jorge David García, Víctor Grippo: Transformación/Transformation, exh. cat. (MUAC, 2014), p. 52, cat. 2.

Alicia Chillida, Víctor Grippo: Transformación, exh. cat. (Museo de Arte del Banco de la República, 2015), n. pag. (color ill.); 28 (color ill.).

Fundação Bienal de São Paulo, Incerteza viva: 32nd Bienal de São Paulo, exh. cat. (Fundação Bienal de São Paulo, 2016), pp. 368; 371 (color ill.); 423.

Alberto Armendáriz, “El calor político se siente en una bienal de San Pablo dedicada a la incertidumbre” (“The political heat is felt in a biennial of San Pablo dedicated to uncertainty”), La Nación (The Nation), September 7, 2016 (color ill.), http://www.lanacion.com.ar/1935264-el-calor-politico-se-siente-en-una-bienal-de-san-pablo-dedicada-a-la-incertidumbre.

Contemporary and, “Installation View III: 32nd Bienal de São Paulo,” Contemporary and, Septermber 7, 2016 (color ill.), http://www.contemporaryand.com/magazines/32nd-bienal-de-sao-paulo-3.

Adrianna Lauria, “Víctor Grippo: vigencia de una obra” (“Víctor Grippo: validity of a work”), La Nación (The Nation), September 11, 2016 (color ill.), http://www.lanacion.com.ar/1935883-victor-grippo-vigencia-de-una-obra.

Brian Droitcour, “São Paulo Bienal,” Art in America 104, no. 11 (December 2016): pp. 128; 129 (color ill.).
exhibition_history:
Fundação Bienal de São Paulo, XIV Bienal de São Paulo, Oct. 1–Dec. 18, 1977, no cat. no.

Birmingham, Ikon Gallery, Víctor Grippo, Apr. 13–May 20, 1995, cat. 11; Brussels, Palais des Beaux-Arts, June 16–Sept. 3, 1995.

Musee d'art modern de la ville de Paris, Da Adversidade Vivemos, June 1–Sept. 30, 2001, no cat. no.

Museo de Arte Latinoamericano Buenos Aires, Grippo. Una retrospectiva. Obras 1971–2001, July 27–Oct. 22, 2004, cat. 11.

Miami Art Central, Víctor Grippo: Works 1971–2001, Mar. 24–June 18, 2006, no cat.

Philadelphia Museum of Art, Notations: Energy Yes!, Apr. 8–Oct. 30, 2006, no cat.

New York, Alexander and Bonin, Víctor Grippo: Selected Works 1978–2001, Nov. 4–Dec. 20, 2006, no cat.

London, Camden Arts Centre, Víctor Grippo: Tables of Work and Reflection, Dec. 8, 2006–Feb. 4, 2007, no cat. no.

Santiago de Compostela, Centro Galego de Arte Contemporánea, Víctor Grippo: Transformación, July 11–Oct. 20, 2013, cat. 8. 

Mexico City, Museo Universitario Arte Contemporáneo, Víctor Grippo: Transformación, June 28–Oct. 19, 2014, cat. 2; Bogotá, Museo de Arte del Banco de la República, Víctor Grippo: Transformación, Nov. 28, 2014–Mar. 3, 2015, no cat. no.

Fundação Bienal de São Paulo, Incerteza viva: 32nd Bienal de São Paulo, Sept. 7–Dec. 11, 2016, no cat. no.
provenance_text: The artist; sold to the Art Institute of Chicago and the Philadelphia Museum of Art, through Alexander and Bonin, New York, February 2009.
